backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with access control, storage mixins, and data models for users, posts, messages, institutions, outreach, monitoring, and mental‑health features.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record describing removal of a share button in the header and listing related files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities for the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling identity, admin assignment, login recording, routing, layout, and conditional dialogs/banners.
frontend/src/components/AdminPromotionBa: UI banner that notifies the user they were promoted to admin with a dismiss button.
frontend/src/components/BreathingAnimati: Animated breathing exercise component with expanding/contracting orb and synchronized text prompts.
frontend/src/components/community/Commun: Renders a community post with edit and delete options, including content moderation checks and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying attribution text and the ShareWebsiteDialog trigger control.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the main navigation header with authentication controls, responsive menus, and dynamic nav items based on user role and login state.
frontend/src/components/outreach/Outreac: Shows an interactive outreach map with filtered markers, satellite toggle, and basic grid‑based visualization.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Displays a required profile setup form with validation and submits user details to the backend.
frontend/src/components/ShareWebsiteDial: Offers a share dialog that opens platform‑specific share links or copies the site URL for unsupported platforms.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods, including user profiles, admin checks, community posts, and role assignments.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, dark mode styles, base styles, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityPage.tsx: Renders community posts, allows authenticated users to create posts with content checks, and supports admin/user editing and deletion.
frontend/src/pages/GuidelinesPage.tsx: Displays community guidelines including principles, acceptable conduct, prohibited behaviors, and safety rules.
frontend/src/pages/HelplinePage.tsx: Shows emergency helplines and online mental health resources with styled informational cards.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main landing page with a hero section, breathing animation, and clickable feature cards for navigation.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesPage.tsx: Implements user and admin messaging with conversations, message sending, reading, and dialog-based UI.
frontend/src/pages/MoodTrackerPage.tsx: Allows users to log moods and view recent history, requiring authentication for recording entries.
frontend/src/pages/OutreachDashboardPage: Provides an admin-focused dashboard for managing reported areas, institutions, monitoring, outreach camps, and analytics.
frontend/src/pages/StressQuizPage.tsx: Presents a multi-step stress quiz, records responses, and displays results based on computed stress scores.
frontend/src/pages/TherapyPage.tsx: React page providing therapy and wellness resources with tabbed content and a form to submit therapy session requests via authenticated users.
frontend/src/utils/outreachMapLinks.ts: Utility functions to generate Google and Apple Maps URLs from coordinates and open them in a new tab.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, containers, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata summarizing features for an ICP-based mental‑health app including authentication, community feed, admin tools, and outreach systems.
